title: You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again and again and again.....
body:
I have like forever leaver buster because of this game stupid bugs.
I keep getting blue screen because my PC is shit and after open again and try to log into the game, I keep getting this message "You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again" and I can't reconnect again till the game ends. ( boom leaver buster <3 )
my internet connection is stable, the firewall is off, windows defender off, no anti-virus at all, what is the hell blocking this game from reconnecting.
Now could tell me how to fix this because I want to play this ...... game.

replies.body:
Not being able to reconnect is troubling for sure, but getting blue screens pretty frequently while playing is a bigger problem we should probably address first to fix this overall. Those crashes make me think something isn't working correctly either between the game files or your pc files/drivers, so I'd check out the steps we have in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to first make sure everything is running smoothly. 

About those reconnection issues, if those are happening after rebooting your pc from blue screens it might actually just be that your pc hadn't gotten a stable connection built again after restarting.
